message.original: <KC ATTACK1>を押す、再度押すと解除
message.translation: Press <KC ATTACK1>, and press it again to cancel.

message.original: <KC ATTACK1>を押す、再度押すと解除
message.translation: Press <KC ATTACK1>, and press it again to cancel.

message.original: <KC SKILL_NORMAL1>を押す、再度押すと解除
message.translation: Press <KC SKILL_NORMAL1>, and press it again to cancel.

message.original: <KC SKILL_NORMAL1>を押す、再度押すと解除
message.translation: Press <KC SKILL_NORMAL1>, and press it again to cancel.
While in the air, press <KC JUMP>

message.original: しがみつき中に<KC ATTACK1>を押す、再度押すと解除
message.translation: While climbing an enemy, press <KC ATTACK1>, and press it again to cancel.

message.original: しがみつき中に<KC SKILL_NORMAL1>を押す、再度押すと解除
message.translation: While climbing an enemy, press <KC SKILL_NORMAL1>, and press it again to cancel.
